abstract: The North American energy loan business of BNP Paribas holds about $9.5 billion worth of financing commitments, with about $3.9 billion that has actually been lent out.
snippet: The North American energy loan business of BNP Paribas holds about $9.5 billion worth of financing commitments, with about $3.9 billion that has actually been lent out.
lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo agreed on Tuesday to buy the North American energy loan business of the French bank BNP Paribas, helping to bolster its capital reserves.

headline.main: Wells Fargo to Buy Energy Loan Unit From BNP Paribas

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
